name: crop_image
description: Crop image to specified region using coordinates.

image_path.description: Path to the input image file

left.description: Left coordinate of crop region. Defaults to 0.

top.description: Top coordinate of crop region. Defaults to 0.

right.description: Right coordinate of crop region. Defaults to image width.

bottom.description: Bottom coordinate of crop region. Defaults to image height.

output_path.description: Path for the output image. If not provided, will create auto-named file.
